about.summary: Computes the Weighted Topological Overlap with positive and negative signs (wTO) networks given a data frame containing the mRNA count/ expression/ abundance per sample, and a vector containing the interested nodes of interaction (a subset of the elements of the full data frame). It also computes the cut-off threshold or p-value based on the individuals bootstrap or the values reshuffle per individual. It also allows the construction of a consensus network, based on multiple wTO networks. The package includes a visualization tool for the networks.  More about the methodology can be found at <arXiv:1711.04702>.

Computes the Weighted Topological Overlap with positive and negative signs (wTO) networks given a data frame containing the mRNA count/ expression/ abundance per sample, and a vector containing the interested nodes of interaction (a subset of the elements of the full data frame). It also computes the cut-off threshold or p-value based on the individuals bootstrap or the values reshuffle per individual. It also allows the construction of a consensus network, based on multiple wTO networks. The package includes a visualization tool for the networks.  More about the methodology can be found at <arXiv:1711.04702>.

name: r-wto
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.6.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-wto
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/wTO_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/wTO/wTO_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d69672bb02b1a9b97c4a38c8ea6b37d6698f4ba1514b88cbbb918cb3cee0ebb1

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-data.table
    - r-igraph
    - r-magrittr
    - r-plyr
    - r-reshape2
    - r-shiny
    - r-som
    - r-visnetwork

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-data.table
    - r-igraph
    - r-magrittr
    - r-plyr
    - r-reshape2
    - r-shiny
    - r-som
    - r-visnetwork

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('wTO')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('wTO')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=wTO
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Computes the Weighted Topological Overlap with positive and negative signs (wTO) networks
    given a data frame containing the mRNA count/ expression/ abundance per sample,
    and a vector containing the interested nodes of interaction (a subset of the elements
    of the full data frame). It also computes the cut-off threshold or p-value based
    on the individuals bootstrap or the values reshuffle per individual. It also allows
    the construction of a consensus network, based on multiple wTO networks. The package
    includes a visualization tool for the networks.  More about the methodology can
    be found at <arXiv:1711.04702>.

  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
